list.description: Scroll contents, in array form, as described above
list.description_zh: 滚动内容，数组形式，见上方说明

volume-icon.description: Whether or not to display the small horn icon

more-icon.description: Whether to display the right arrow on the right
more-icon.description_zh: 是否显示右边的向右箭头

close-icon.description: Whether or not to display the close icon

autoplay.description: Whether or not to play automatically

show.description: Whether it is displayed or not

volume-size.description: The size of the horn on the left

duration.description: The length of the rolling cycle is only valid for the stepper mode, and the horizontal connection mode is invalid, in ms
duration.description_zh: 滚动周期时长，只对步进模式有效，横向衔接模式无效，单位ms

speed.description: The scroll speed when scrolling horizontally, i.e. how much distance is moved per second, is only valid for the horizontal articulation method, in rpx
speed.description_zh: 水平滚动时的滚动速度，即每秒移动多少距离，只对水平衔接方式有效，单位rpx

is-circular.description: fashion为horizontal时,指明是否水平衔接滚动
is-circular.description_zh: mode为horizontal时，指明是否水平衔接滚动

play-state.description: 播放状态，play - 播放，paused - 暂停
play-state.description_zh: 播放状态，play - 播放，paused - 暂停

disable-touch.description: Whether to prohibit the manual swiping to switch notifications, only mode = vertical, or mode = horizontal and is-circular = false, only App 2.5.5+, H5 2.5.5+, Alipay Mini Program, and ByteDance Mini Program are supported
disable-touch.description_zh: 是否禁止通过手动滑动切换通知，只有mode = vertical，或者mode = horizontal且is-circular = false时有效；只支持App 2.5.5+、H5 2.5.5+、支付宝小程序、字节跳动小程序

padding.description: Built-in padding for scroll notifications, strings, like "16rpx 20rpx"
padding.description_zh: 内置滚动通知的内边距，字符串，类似"16rpx 20rpx"

no-list-hidden.description: If the list is an empty array, whether to display the component
no-list-hidden.description_zh: list为空数组时，是否显示组件

events.name: click
events.description: 点击通告文字触发,只有mode = vertical,或者mode = horizontal且is-circular = false时有效
events.description_zh: 点击通告文字触发，只有mode = vertical，或者mode = horizontal且is-circular = false时有效
events.params: index：当前文字所在list数组的索引值

events.name: close
events.description: Click the turn off icon on the right to trigger
events.description_zh: 点击右侧关闭图标触发

events.name: getMore
events.description: Click the right-to-right icon to trigger
events.description_zh: 点击右侧向右图标触发

events.name: end
events.description: The message of the list is triggered every time it is played for one cycle, and it is only valid if mode = vertical, or mode = horizontal and is-circular = false
events.description_zh: 列表的消息每次被播放一个周期时触发，只有mode = vertical，或者mode = horizontal且is-circular = false时有效
